name: Ruins of Lathar
description:
Lathar, once the home of the most powerful dragons, is now in an eternal dispute. The races that have managed to survive fight day after day for the control of the few territories that remain and that ensure, at least for some days, the continuity of their own ancestry.

Mechanics

  • Get power-ups to be stronger.
  • Fly between islands to avoid the storm.
  • Become the last drake alive.
  • Customize your drake with races and skins.

This project was done when I was student, as a team of 5 people. I just made the programming part.
